attributes.action: Release full crime statistics involving illegal immigrants and asylum seekers.
attributes.additional_details: Illegal immigration is out of control and the British public are being kept in the dark about its true impact. Crimes committed by those who entered the UK unlawfully threaten the safety of citizens and children. The government must release full data to restore accountability, protect the public, and uphold national security.
attributes.background: The Government must immediately release full, unedited crime statistics involving all undocumented migrants and asylum recipients. The British public, who fund asylum through taxes, have the absolute right to know the safety impact and financial burden — no delays, no excuses, full transparency now.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what statistics you'd like the Government to publish that it doesn't already publish.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more about what statistics the Government already publishes, here: https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/statistics-on-foreign-national-offenders-and-the-immigration-system/statistics-on-foreign-national-offenders-and-the-immigration-system
